title: Win! Flight simulator experience at iPilot
content:
Flight simulator experience at iPilot
Plane crazy? Even if your head’s in the clouds you could be the winner of a 30 minute flight simulator experience with iPilot in Yas Mall this week. Take off and earn your stripes as a commercial aeroplane pilot in this total immersion experience with an expert instructor that could see you landing anywhere from Hong Kong to St Maarten. For your chance to win, just answer this: Enter Competition
